entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
